title: Online Education Based on Vivid Case Studies for Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational management theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in smartphone-centric, technology-limited environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze organizational development issues in real corporate settings and propose specific improvement plans.
Strengthen leadership and collaboration competencies required for organizational change management through vivid case studies.
Learners can complete asynchronous collaborative projects using LMS and mobile devices.

resources: Asynchronous Collaboration Tools (e.g., Mobile Slack, Trello)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
